desc: ベクタスに存在する機械人形の装甲

dictionary.lore: There are numerous large automatons with dense armor active on the other world of Bectas, and some units even feature resistance against magic. Some speculate that these automatons were fashioned using magic as well as science, but the details remain unfortunately unclear. At present, the armor of these automatons can be purchased at high prices as a precious Material.

name: 幽機装甲
